item.title: Get Paid For Pooping
item.description: Yes I know it sounds dumb but, if during your working hours you go to the toilet, technically, you are getting paid for it. ðŸ’© Use case Alright, lets say you you earn $10 an hour and during those 8 hours of daily work, you go twice to the bathroom, for around 10 minutes each time. Then a simple multiplication shows that your “poop time” is worth around $3.34 per day!
